attributes.action: Change the laws about bringing dogs into the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to a inadequacy in the Pet passport scheme a dog that has had his rabies injection, blood test and waited the required six months to enter England cannot come into the country because its microchip was fitted the day after it had his rabies injection. Because Legally the dog didn't exist on the day it had its rabies jab even though all the paperwork shows that the dog did exist and had the appropriate injection.
